statements: SELECT * FROM course_assessments;
SELECT student_id, score FROM course_assessments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM course_assessments GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM course_assessments WHERE score >= 90 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS num_students FROM course_assessments GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_students DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_assessments WHERE student_id = 123 AND grade = 'A' ORDER BY score DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT course_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM course_assessments GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS assessment_count FROM course_assessments GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY assessment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_assessments WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B', 'C') ORDER BY grade ASC, score DESC;
SELECT course_id, MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM course_assessments GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_assessments;
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM course_assessments;
SELECT course_name, assessment_date FROM course_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluation_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT course_name, score FROM course_assessments JOIN evaluation_scores ON course_assessments.course_id = evaluation_scores.course_id;
SELECT course_name, assessment_date FROM course_assessments
SELECT * FROM course_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT course_id, course_name, assessment_date FROM course_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT course_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM course_assessments JOIN evaluation_scores ON course_assessments.course_id = evaluation_scores.course_id GROUP BY course_name
SELECT course_name, assessment_date FROM course_assessments WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM evaluation_scores WHERE score > 90)
SELECT * FROM course_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name FROM course_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Quiz';
SELECT * FROM student_assessment_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT course_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM student_assessment_scores GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM course_evaluation WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, assessment_name ASC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_type FROM course_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Exam';
SELECT course_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM student_assessment_scores GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS num_evaluations FROM course_evaluation GROUP BY course_id ORDER BY num_evaluations DESC;
SELECT course_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM course_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_rating > 100;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT assessment_type, assessment_grade FROM assessments WHERE assessment_grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_major FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, evaluation_date, assessment_grade FROM students JOIN evaluations ON students.student_id = evaluations.student_id;
SELECT * FROM course
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM student JOIN course ON student.course_id = course.course_id
SELECT assessment_name, course_name FROM assessment JOIN course ON assessment.course_id = course.course_id
SELECT student_name, grade FROM student JOIN grade_report ON student.student_id = grade_report.student_id
SELECT * FROM course;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, assessment_name, score FROM student s JOIN grade_report g ON s.student_id = g.student_id JOIN assessment a ON a.assessment_id = g.grade_id;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM assessment a JOIN evaluation e ON a.assessment_id = e.assessment_id WHERE e.student_id = 7;
SELECT s.student_name, g.grade FROM student s JOIN grade_report g ON s.student_id = g.student_id WHERE g.course_id = 3;
